text: Sir Thomas Daniel Courtenay (born 25 February 1937) is an English actor.Tom Courtenay Biography (1937-) His career began during the 1960s. He is known for his roles in The Loneliness of the Long Distance Runner (1962), Billy Liar (1963), Doctor Zhivago (1965), The Dresser (1983), and in Last Orders. He won a Golden Globe Award for Best Actor in 1983 and a BAFTA TV Award for Best Actor in 1999. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Yorkshire Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors
